author: Staff Reporter
text:
A special team comprising section officers and under secretaries of various departments of the Central Government and Ministry of Human Resources Development stated that certain special schemes of the State government, that were not implemented in other states like gold for mangalsutra, cradle baby scheme, baby gift scheme were executed well in the district.

While interacting with officials here on Thursday, they held discussions in this connection. They were keen on knowing about the implementation of these special schemes and their outcome.

Later, the team inspected the primary health centre at Veerapandi and facilities available at Cumbum GH. They also enquired about hospital deliveries in the district, steps taken by the government to prevent dropouts from schools and measures taken by the officials in bringing dropouts back to school.

Besides, the team conducted a field study to understand and analyse implementation of various Central government schemes by the State departments. The officials collected data on total number of beneficiaries of various Central government schemes and inspected various departments.

Several central teams have been touring the State since February 2, engaged in field study of Central government schemes, especially on NRHM, family planning, AIDS control programme, SSA and other rural development works.
title: Central team tours district
